unnormalised: Lights, Camera, FESTIVAL! Movie buffs, get ready! Film festival season is officially upon us, and it's gonna be a rollercoaster!
normalised: Lights, Camera, FESTIVAL! Movie buffs, get ready! Film festival season is officially upon us, and it is going to be a rollercoaster!

unnormalised: From the hallowed halls of the National Film Archive of India (NFAI) in Pune prepping vintage prints to local college fests showcasing student talent, there's something for everyone. Heard whispers about the Chennai International Film Festival prepping a special retrospective on Mani Ratnam! Imagine – a whole week of 'Roja' and 'Bombay' on the big screen again!
normalised: From the hallowed halls of the N F A I in Pune prepping vintage prints to local college fests showcasing student talent, there is something for everyone. Heard whispers about the Chennai International Film Festival prepping a special retrospective on Mani Ratnam! Imagine – a whole week of 'Roja' and 'Bombay' on the big screen again!

unnormalised: Plus, word on the street is that they'll be serving amazing biryani at the opening night gala in Mumbai! Forget the Oscars, THIS is where it's at. Forget red carpets, bring on the sambar!
normalised: Plus, word on the street is that they will be serving amazing biryani at the opening night gala in Mumbai! Forget the Oscars, THIS is where it is at. Forget red carpets, bring on the sambar!

unnormalised: We're also keeping our eyes peeled for announcements from the Kerala film festivals after the Onam celebrations wind down. Get ready for some serious indie gems, folks! Bookmark those dates and ditch those binge-watching plans – it's time to rediscover the magic of cinema! Early bird registrations are open now, so don't delay! The festival circuits await, and trust us, you don't want to miss out. Last year saw 5000+ entries for the short film category alone!
normalised: We are also keeping our eyes peeled for announcements from the Kerala film festivals after the Onam celebrations wind down. Get ready for some serious indie gems, folks! Bookmark those dates and ditch those binge-watching plans – it is time to rediscover the magic of cinema! Early bird registrations are open now, so don't delay! The festival circuits await, and trust us, you don't want to miss out. Last year saw five thousand plus entries for the short film category alone!
